replies.body:
{{champion:112}} **I congratulate you two for making it all the way to me Jayce and Skarner, but what good will that do you? All of your fighters and even those 2 robots of yours are to busy fighting my army. **

{{champion:126}} The two of us are all we need to fight you Viktor. 

{{champion:72}} **YEAH!!!**

{{champion:112}}** But it not just mean. I do have my Battlecast right here with me. Destroy them Battlecase Cho'gath, Vel'koz, and Urgot. 
**

{{champion:161}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:31}} **Yes Master!**

{{champion:72}} **Jayce, what do we do now?**

{{champion:126}} Don't worry Skarner. While Caitlyn was getting help from Demacia and Vi was getting Jinx on our side, I was also getting help and they should arrive right about now. 

{{champion:236}} THE CULLING!!!!

{{champion:67}} SILVER OF THE MOON!!!!!

{{champion:112}} **What the!?**


{{champion:236}} In noob-fill days

{{champion:67}} In laggest nights

{{champion:236}} {{champion:67}} No evil shall escape our sight. 

{{champion:236}} Let those who follow darkness might

{{champion:67}} Be purified by the light.  

*Poses with a random background explosion*

{{champion:112}} ...

{{champion:126}} ...

{{champion:72}} **That was AWESOME!**
I laughed really hard on the speech Lucian and Vayne gave :)

Thank you. I went through many kinds of lines. I was going to have Vayne say the lines from the old Sailor Moon show (the whole in the name of the moon I will purify you) but I needed something for Lucian, trial and errors later and I got this. I quite liked it. :D
I hope someone realizes that was really just the Green Lantern motto XD

{{champion:38}}Silence!!! Oh wait..he doesn't have that anymore umm...

{{champion:7}} Silence!! wait...doesn't have it either as well....Mmm...

{{champion:31}} SILENCE!! Yeah...that works.
{{champion:90}}  I'm next.
For some reason I can picture them kinda like Team Rocket with Ziggs being like Meowth lol.
ziggs, that's right!
Please....if I was going for a team rocket thing with them..Meowth would of been a Poro.
an even more adoroable idea....

No its from Monty python and the holy grail.
